definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
Matsushita (name)/Panasonic (brand), abbr. for 松下電器|松下电器[Song1 xia4 Dian4 qi4]
Songhua River in Jilin province 吉林省 through Harbin 哈尔滨, a tributary of Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江
loose/slack/(fig.) to soften (policies, tone of voice)/to give some slack/(of a place) not crowded
to relax/to relax efforts/to slack off/to take it easy/complacent/undisciplined

sentences.english: Bamboo water side edge loose stone, a good ten years ago in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 石边流水竹边松，中有十年前好风。

sentences.english: The shoelace has relaxed , the place also should go to a nobody has finished being.
sentences.chinese: 鞋带松了，也应走到没人的地方系好。

sentences.english: Creates loose couplings between the client components and the services they use.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端组件和它们所使用的服务之间建立了松耦合。

sentences.english: Almost all the bottom of the cases were loose.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的外箱底部都松了。

sentences.english: The place to see son has red flag finally relieved.
sentences.chinese: 见儿子有了去处，文红旗终于松了口气。

sentences.english: Cedar columns flare at their base as they prop up the Douglas fir logs overhead.
sentences.chinese: 雪松柱熠熠生辉地在支撑着上方的花旗松原木。

sentences.english: There must be a loose wire in my radio somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我的收音机肯定什么地方有条线松了。

sentences.english: On Thursday, the yen selloff gave other Asian currencies a breather.
sentences.chinese: 周四，日圆抛售潮让亚洲其他货币松了口气。

sentences.english: Mr. Oddsson, a lawyer, doesn't have that credential.
sentences.chinese: 而身为律师的奥德松不符合这项要求。

sentences.english: Three tree nests mysterious ancient crane, the lower five prime Luan loose.
sentences.chinese: 三株树古巢玄鹤，五粒松低下素鸾。

sentences.english: A sigh of relief, but one moment, what about Sandro?
sentences.chinese: 这真让人松了一口气，但是，桑德罗呢？

sentences.english: Meanwhile, lab rearing of the pest was tested.
sentences.chinese: 同时，探索了松实小卷蛾的室内饲养方法。

sentences.english: Cruise ships visit Ny Alesund throughout the summer, some small, some large.
sentences.chinese: 夏季会有游艇停泊在新奥勒松，有小的，也有大的。

sentences.english: She needs to be brushed and one shoe is loose.
sentences.chinese: 它需要刷毛了，一只马掌松了。

sentences.english: He let out another sigh of relief.

definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑[Xian1 bei1] nomadic people/two-character surname Yuwen
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
